word: H6154 - עֵרֶב - ʻêreb - ay'-reb - Arabia - அரபிதேசம்

sections.paragraph: woof, as mixed, interwoven, knitted material, mixture, mixed people, mixed company
Part(s) of speech: Noun Masculine / பெயர்ச்சொல் (ஆண்பால்)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: The second form used in 1Ki 10:15 with the article prefixed); from H6148; the web (or transverse threads of cloth); also a mixture, (or mongrel race): - Arabia, mingled people, mixed (multitude), woof.
Cognate: H6154, H6157
